content:
Anyone facing the issue of a FHIR Build failure with the following:

build-project:
[javac] javac: Invalid target release: 1.8

Other Info: This is a brand new checkout from the SVN of the latest source.
I have Java 1.7 and have provided the path to the SDK as part of the publish.bat
@Nagesh Bashyam The current FHIR build uses Java 8. You'll need to update your local Java to 1.8.
FHIR build process updated to reflect.

Thanks Richard for the info. Things seem to working better.
Brett - Thanks for updating the document.
